text:

Groups of people are neurodiverse.

Saw this statement from a judgment by #RBG and thought how perfectly it expressed the idea that any definition of ‚ÄòWe the People‚Äô must include us all.
Not treated exactly the same but adapted according to our need to thrive. 
Enabling. Responsive to difference.

text:
@TheOperaGeek I think maybe it has not seemed to me that neurodiversity necessarily engenders differences as significant as being from a racially or sexually marginalized group does. 

"Diversity" can be an odd word too. Like, "racial diversity" sounds great, but "diversity hire" is insutling.
user_description: Likely Internet Crank. I was a hermit before it was popular.
tokenized_text: think maybe seemed necessarily engenders differences significant racially sexually marginalized group diversity odd word like racial diversity sounds great diversity hire insutling
